name: Haunted Serpent's Tower
description:
A dangerous tower awaits this adventurous Snake! Hailed by absolutely no one as the "Dark Souls" of game jam games, something bad happens when you die in this game Just Like In That Other Game™

As the game contains no way to heal, it is accidentally extremely hard. A few different weapons may await you in the dungeon, but they might also be plain bad.

a Global Game Jam 2012 game
Programming by The Monstre King
Art by FrankieSmileShow

  • Semi Random level order! Different playthroughs will show different stages and different areas!
  • Five different weapons, including a completely useless one and one that works weirdly and may bug the game, rendering it unusable!
  • Dying in an area will make your haunted skeleton appear there next time you go, making it attack you. Avoid dying!
  • A reasonably hard boss made harder by the fact you will probably only have one hit left when you reach it!
  • This game contains bats (the animal)
